mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order ( order_id, order_status, order_time, order_amount, user_id, user_name, product_id, product_name, expire_time, unit_price, total_price ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderTime}, #{orderAmount}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{expireTime}, #{unitPrice}, #{totalPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, order_status, order_time, order_amount, user_id, user_name, product_id, product_name, expire_time, unit_price, total_price FROM tb_order WHERE (user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId} AND order_status = 0 )
